safetyTips: Contact-free delivery is offered via Royal Mail or by personal delivery through the letterbox or at a safe distance.
name: Rosa & Clara Designs
description: Rosa & Clara Designs was founded by Jessica Hayman, a designer/illustrator who works from her home studio in East Dulwich.  She creates stationery, gifts and homewares featuring cheerful and charming illustrations and patterns.  The ranges include prints of Brick Lane's Beigel Bake and Peckham's own Manzes Pie House, cards for every occasion, brightly patterned coasters, placemats and wash bags and a variety of lampshades and cushions suitable for both little ones and bigger ones.  Jessica also offers house portraits.  All products are made in Britain and the lampshades are handmade by Jessica.  There is free shipping on most products as standard and you can also have free shipping on cushions and lampshades with the code DULWICHDELIVERS.
